case.name: Galatea Single
case.description: Lux asks Galatea if she's single - she's trying to play matchmaker with Galio (a giant gargoyle).

case.name: Lux Puns (F)
case.description: Must Strip (F) puns. The exact number of puns is tracked by the marker Light_Pun. React with exasperation or other emotions.

case.name: Lux Puns (M)
case.description: Must Strip (M) puns. The exact number of puns is tracked by the marker Light_Pun. React with exasperation or other emotions.

case.name: Lux Puns Criitcal Mass (M)
case.description: Lux's puns have reached a critical mass and she is running out of ideas. Even stoic characters might react to her terribly forced puns in these lines.

case.name: Lux Puns Critical Mass (F)
case.description: Lux's puns have reached a critical mass and she is running out of ideas. Even stoic characters might react to her terribly forced puns in these lines.

case.name: What's Japan?
case.description: Lux doesn't know what Japan is. She assumes it's a part of Ionia, LoL's equivalent to East Asia.

case.name: It's Magic!
case.description: Lux asks other mages if they have names for their spells.

case.name: Wanna hang out?
case.description: Lux asks the other players if they want to hang out after the game - she says this while masturbating in a very cheery way.

case.name: Light Puns Start Here
case.description: If Lux says Light_Pun_Trigger, she is going to start intentionally saying more "Light" based puns as the game goes on. Other cases may trigger this marker earlier, e.g. if a target is shy or gloomy.

notes.note: The intention of this line is that Lux is immediately contrasting herself by starting off cheery and then casually mentioning that real pirates murder and pillage
Lux rambles and cuts herself off (or gets cut off when senko responds if you like)

label.label: Preset Table Banter "Battle in the Mid Lane"
